response.overview: We’re taking you back to 1988 when all this started! Travel back in time with Bob Lazar to “S4", where he was hired by the department of Naval Intelligence to reverse engineer alien technology. ‘Lazar: The Original Whistleblower’ is a revolutionary documentary film featuring cutting edge technology, creating never before seen stunning realistic 3D visuals to immerse you in this fascinating story like never before.
response.title: Lazar, The Original Whistleblower
